title: Whispers from Heaven
description: CAN LOVE FIND A WAY?Arianna and Tristan are both struggling to come to terms with their loss - one that is having a detrimental effect on their future. Arianna has descended deep into her grief and is finding it hard to move forward. Tristan remains firm by her side with his unwavering support. Unbeknownst to Arianna, Tristan has fallen irrevocably in love with her. Through loyalty to his dead brother, Tristan is fighting his feelings daily. He wants to be as close to his nephew as possible and help to take care of Arianna and the baby as he promised his brother he would do. Through fear of losing them both, he conceals his feelings, offers the hand of friendship and suffers in silence...
author: D.G. Torrens
